_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

DigitalCapability.description: A document used to provide information about a business party and its digital trade capabilities.

DigitalCapability.title: Digital Capability. Details
DigitalCapability.description: A document used to provide information about a business party and its digital trade capabilities.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Digital Capability. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Digital Capability. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Digital Capability. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Digital Capability. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Digital Capability. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

UUID.title: Digital Capability. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Digital Capability. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Digital Capability. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

VersionID.title: Digital Capability. Version Identifier. Identifier
VersionID.description: Identifies the current version of party's digital capabilities.

PreviousVersionID.title: Digital Capability. Previous Version Identifier. Identifier
PreviousVersionID.description: Identifies the previous version of party's digital capabilities.

Signature.title: Digital Capability. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

SenderParty.title: Digital Capability. Sender_ Party. Party
SenderParty.description: The party sending these digital capabilities. This party could be the owner of these digital capabilities or a third-party acting on behalf of the owner (e.g. service provider).

ReceiverParty.title: Digital Capability. Receiver_ Party. Party
ReceiverParty.description: The party receiving these digital capabilities.

BusinessParty.title: Digital Capability. Business_ Party. Party
BusinessParty.description: The party owning these digital capabilities.

DigitalProcess.title: Digital Capability. Digital Process
DigitalProcess.description: The digital trade processes supported by the party.
